title: ‘Self driving’ lab investigates doped nanocrystals
content: A new "self-driving" lab could let researchers study metal halide perovskite nanocrystals and a broad array of semiconductor and metallic nanomaterials.
description: A new "self-driving" lab could let researchers study metal halide perovskite nanocrystals and a broad array of semiconductor and metallic nanomaterials.
